issue.title: Modules: last orders & pending requests
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We developed front-end modules for our usage of SHOP:
- One displaying the 5 last order
- One displaying the 5 last pending requests

They also offer a link to complete lists (orders and requests)

Are you interested in merging the in easySDI ?

Work todo would be :
- Change some strings (translation prefixes, reuse a maximum from SHOP)
- Move the tables row rendering from Views to Layout in the SHOP component (/components/easysdi_shop/layout) to reuse them
- Update the build process (ANT)

Producing the same for validation would be easy.

Preview:
!modules_lastorders_pendingrequests.png!

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
